name: Marlena Compton
bio: Marlena Compton is a software developer, writer and collaboration artist. She organizes conferences such as “Pear Conf” and “Let’s Sketch Tech!” builds software, and introduces people to pair programming. Marlena’s agile hat-trick of working for IBM, Pivotal and Atlassian, has left her with a life-long appreciation for quality code, empathy and working together as a team. Marlena enjoys writing about tech, sketching talks at conferences and sometimes giving talks too.
